title: Die Denkmalpflege
additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Die Denkmalpflege is the current title of a long-running preservation periodical, used continuously since 1994.  Before then, the publication had other titles, including 'Deutsche Kunst und Denkmalpflege' from 1934-1944 and 1952â€“1993.  'Die Denkmalpflege' was also the title of predecessor intervals from 1899-1922 and 1930-1933.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
